data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaydan, Mehmet Bora, Benedicty, Zsuzsanna Konczne, Kiss, Balazs, Szita, Eva (2016): A survey of scale insects in soil samples from Europe (Hemiptera, Coccomorpha). ZooKeys 565: 1-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.565.6877, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.565.6877
